creator: Standard Bank / Stanbic Bank
descriptionHtml:
Shyft allows you to purchase, store and manage both local & foreign currencies on the go. You can make domestic and international payments, online purchases with virtual cards or shop at a store with a Shyft Mastercard debit card, either in Rands or your preferred foreign currency, saving you time and money. Sign up using our new and improved Digital Onboarding process.

Spending or traveling abroad?
Buy foreign exchange instantaneously at great rates. Order up to 3 Multicurrency Shyft Mastercard debit cards to use while travelling overseas and save up to 5% on banking fees. Use our free Foreign exchange virtual card for managing international subscriptions, booking flights or paying for hotels in foreign currency. Travelling to the far East? We also offer a Union Pay International Card accepted throughout China, order one via the app today.

Need to take money offshore?
The Shyft Global Wallet provides you with a safe and secure way to purchase and hold foreign currencies at fantastic rates. You can also easily and conveniently send forex to an offshore bank account by creating an offshore beneficiary and transferring funds as and when required. Great for transfers into offshore funds, or to family and friends.

Staying home?
With Shyft you can order and link up to 5 physical Mastercard debit cards to use locally. You can also create up to 10 free Virtual cards to shop online and manage online subscriptions. Make Payments to other Shyft users instantaneously through our Shyft to Shyft payment feature.

Available currencies:
USD
GBP
EUR
AUD
ZAR

Our digital sign-up process allows you to complete the entire onboarding process from the convenience of your smartphone even if you’re not a Standard Bank client.

Shyft - The Home of Global Citizen
descriptionShort: Send, spend and exchange currency anywhere in the world.

• Fixed a crash that was occurring on some devices when entering the payment flow
• Fixed the registration form for Foreign Nationals where users could not proceed past this form
• Added the ability to capture alpha-numeric characters for passport numbers
• Various UI enhancements

title: Shyft

creator: Standard Bank / Stanbic Bank
descriptionHtml:
Shyft is the financial app that gives you more for less, 24/7. Buy, store, send & invest forex with Shyft – no matter where you bank! Shyft will save you time and money with fast transactions, flat rates and no commission fees. With our new-and-improved digital sign-up process, you can complete the entire onboarding process from the convenience of your smartphone.

Want to invest?
Shyft Shares allows you to invest in the top U.S. stocks and ETFs directly from your phone. See the most popular shares and how they have been tracking over the last 30 days and create a watchlist to keep your eye on. All you’ll need to start trading is your tax number.

Spending or traveling abroad?
Buy foreign exchange instantaneously at great rates. Order multiple Multi-currency Shyft Mastercard debit cards to use while travelling overseas and save up to 5% on card fees. Use our free foreign exchange virtual cards for managing international subscriptions, booking flights or paying for hotels in foreign currency. Travelling to the Far East? We also offer a Union Pay International Card accepted throughout China, order one via the app today.

Need to take money offshore?
The Shyft Global Wallet provides you with a safe and secure way to purchase and hold foreign currencies at fantastic rates. You can also easily and conveniently send forex to an offshore bank account by creating an offshore beneficiary and transferring funds as and when required. Payments to the US, UK and Europe can take less than a day to settle.

Staying home?
With Shyft you can order and link multiple Mastercard debit cards to use locally. You can also create free virtual cards to shop online and manage online subscriptions. Plus, make payments to other Shyft users instantaneously through our Shyft to Shyft payment feature.

Available currencies:
USD
GBP
EUR
AUD
ZAR

Shyft - The Home of Global Citizen
descriptionShort: Send, spend and exchange currency anywhere in the world.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Inclusion of Shares portfolio balance on the Transact tab
Inclusion of Shares portfolio balance on Globalview
Enhanced Shares buy flow to display more transactional details
Various minor bug fixes and enhancements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’ve beefed up security (like, beefier than Mr T) with a nifty authentication feature. If anyone without your unique face ID attempts to log in to your account and perform certain tasks, a veritable iron curtain of security will protect your moolah and investments.

 Once you’re enrolled, authentication will be required to update a password when logged out, add a beneficiary or new device and make payments or top-ups above a set threshold.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve streamlined our global onboarding process, making it easy and seamless for you to become a global citizen of Shyft. We’re also flexing our offshore portfolio muscles, and with our latest release, they’ve never looked better. The secret? Integrated investment partners. We’ve set up these partnerships so that you can fund your offshore portfolios at the tap of a button.

title: Shyft

creator: Standard Bank / Stanbic Bank
descriptionHtml:
Save, spend, and invest anywhere in the world.

Shyft is the award winning retail forex, investments and payments app that gives you more for less, 24/7. Buy, store, send & invest the cheapest forex with Shyft – no matter where you bank! Shyft will save you time and money with fast transactions, flat rates and no commission fees. With our new-and-improved digital sign-up process, you can complete the entire onboarding process from the convenience of your smartphone.

Shop
Shop locally and use your ZAR card to make purchases by swiping, or tap and go securely. You can also shop for the latest brands from around the globe using a Shyft virtual forex card. You can also use your virtual card for managing international subscriptions, booking flights or paying for hotels in foreign currency.

Travel
Order Multi-currency Shyft Mastercard debit cards to use while travelling overseas and save up to 5% on card fees. Apart from the four currencies currently available on Shyft, you can use your physical Shyft forex card to withdraw local currency from any Mastercard supported ATM in the country you’re visiting (conversion fees may apply). Buy a souvenir or two with your physical card, and top up your cards anytime, anywhere, right from the app. Travelling to the Far East? We also offer a Union Pay International Card accepted throughout China, order one via the app today.

Invest
Shyft Shares allows you to invest in the top U.S. stocks and ETFs directly from your phone, so now you can also own a share in the world’s best companies. appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s a new year and that means: out with the old, in with the new. It also means a slew of
updates and improvements on the app to help you slay (see what we did there? ) in 2023.

cards. We’ve also made it simpler to add shares to your Watchlist and introduced some
enhancements and bug fixes. Fewer taps, more user-friendly. And go!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our team has been tinkering to make our app even better, this month’s release includes:

• Whatsapp Support: Customers can now use WhatsApp to chat to Support from the Help menu.
• Portfolio view: Column ordering and sorting: Columns can now be sorted and ordered whichever way you’d like.
• Card Delete and Devalue: If you try to delete a card with a balance on it, the application will offer to sweep that balance back to the wallet before deleting the card.
• Numerous bug fixes and enhancements

See the most popular shares and how they have been tracking over the last 30 days and create a watchlist to keep your eye on. All you’ll need to start trading is your tax number.

Need to take money offshore?
The Shyft Global Wallet provides you with a safe and secure way to purchase and hold foreign currencies at the cheapest rates. You can also easily and conveniently send forex to an offshore bank account by creating an offshore beneficiary and transferring funds as and when required. Payments to the US, UK and Europe can take less than a day to settle.

Get your money moving
So, you’ve got the app and your cards, you’ve bought forex, but what else does the Shyft app offer you? This should give you an idea: You can send money to Shyft users, for free, or pay international beneficiaries, charged at a flat rate. You can now also access and fund an offshore account with the help of our integrated partners.

Available currencies:
USD
GBP
EUR
AUD
ZAR
